text: You jing ren zhong you xuduo ren, zai zhenli [muhanmode shi an la de shizhe] dui tamen xianming hou, youyu neixin jidu, tamen xiwang nimen chengwei xinshi hou you ba nimen bian cheng buxinyang zhe. Yinci, zai an la de mingling jianglin qian, nimen dang yuanliang tamen, dang kuanshu tamen. An la dui wanshi que shi wanneng de.
